title: MD
biography: Kim Seung-gyu is a South Korean professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for J1 League club FC Tokyo and the South Korea national team.
aiSummary: Seung Up Kim is a hepatology specialist with an H-index of 99 at Yonsei University (Member). Has been published in Nature Biotechnology, Journal of Neuroscience Research, Nature Genetics. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
